TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDesigner implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 提供建置 (Build) 自訂設計工具的基本架構。

span.span: Provides the basic framework for building a custom designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面會提供您可以透過此實作基本服務設計工具的介面。The interface provides an interface through which you can implement basic services for a designer. 設計工具可以在設計階段修改元件的行為，而且可能會提供其自己的服務和行為。A designer can modify the behavior of a component at design time, and may provide its own services and behavior. 設計工具才可以在設計階段，而且必須與元件使用的型別相關聯才能在設計階段建立相關聯的類型的元件時載入。A designer is only active at design-time, and must be associated with a type of component using a in order to be loaded when a component of the associated type is created at design time. 介面會提供方法和屬性，您可以實作以在設計階段提供自訂行為。The interface provides methods and properties that you can implement in order to provide custom behavior at design time. 實作設計工具來建立元件時執行動作的方法。Implement the method of a designer to perform actions when a component is created. 如果元件應該在設計階段有特殊的設定，或其組態應根據設計工具可以判斷條件而變更，這可以是很有用。This can be useful if a component should have a special configuration at design-time, or if its configuration should change depending on conditions that the designer can determine. 設計工具可以提供功能表命令時，使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下元件或控制項設計階段環境中會顯示快顯功能表上。A designer can provide menu commands on the shortcut menu that is displayed when a user right-clicks a component or control in the design-time environment. 您可以實作屬性可定義 get 存取子會傳回包含產生功能表命令的物件。You can implement the property to define a get accessor that returns a containing the objects for generating menu commands. 按兩下元件時，會出現在元件匣中的元件的設計工具可以執行預設動作。A designer for a component that appears in the component tray can perform a default action when the component is double-clicked. 實作方法，以指定要執行按兩下元件時的行為。Implement the method to specify the behavior to perform when the component is double-clicked. 設計工具來執行管理工作，包括調查目前的設計階段環境的元件和其屬性、 讀取及設定的元件屬性的值不同也可以使用可用的設計階段服務[工具箱]，管理選取的元件，或顯示使用者介面，可用來設定值，或適用於進一步處理。A designer can also use the available design-time services to perform a variety of tasks, including surveying the current design-time environment for components and their properties, reading and setting the values of properties of components, managing the toolbox, managing selected components, or displaying a user interface that can be used to configure values or to apply further processing. 若要在表單上實作可以設置控制項的設計工具，您可以繼承自類別。To implement a designer for a control that can be sited on a form, you can inherit from the class. 控制項的相關聯的設計工具不是衍生自會顯示在元件匣中。Controls whose associated designer does not derive from are displayed in the component tray. 和類別會實作介面，並提供可能用來決定的設計工具的作者的其他設計階段支援。The and classes implement the interface and provide additional design-time support that may be of use to authors of designers. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱這些類別的參考文件。For more information, see the reference documentation for these classes. 如需建立設計元件的概觀，請參閱[擴充設計階段支援](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2)。For an overview of creating design components, please see [Extending Design-Time Support](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2). ## Examples 這個範例會示範儲存其元件的本機參考的實作會執行預設動作，按兩下元件，並提供設計工具動詞命令功能表命令。This example demonstrates an implementation that stores a local reference to its component, performs a default action when the component is double-clicked, and provides a designer verb menu command. [!code-cpp[IDesignerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerExample/CPP/testcontrol.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IDesignerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerExample/CS/testcontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IDesignerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerExample/VB/testcontrol.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Component As IComponent
public: property System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ Component { System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得此設計工具正在設計的基底元件。

span.span: Gets the base component that this designer is designing.

value.span: ，表示這個設計工具正在設計的基底元件。

span.span: An indicating the base component that this designer is designing.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DoDefaultAction() cil managed

summary.span: 執行這個設計工具的預設動作。

span.span: Performs the default action for this designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按兩下元件在元件匣中的表示法時，會呼叫這個方法。This method is called when a user double-clicks the representation of a component in the component tray.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed

param.name: component
param.span: 與這個設計工具相關聯的元件。

span.span: The component to associate with this designer.

summary.span: 使用指定的元件，初始化設計工具。

span.span: Initializes the designer with the specified component.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Verbs As DesignerVerbCollection

summary.span: 取得設計工具所支援的設計階段動詞命令集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the design-time verbs supported by the designer.

value.span: ，包含設計工具所支援的動詞命令，如果元件沒有動詞命令則為 。

span.span: A that contains the verbs supported by the designer, or if the component has no verbs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回設計階段與設計工具相關聯的元件所支援的動詞命令。Returns the design time verbs supported by the component associated with the designer. 以滑鼠右鍵按一下功能表中的設計階段環境通常會顯示這個方法所傳回的動詞命令。The verbs returned by this method are typically displayed by the design-time environment in a right-click menu. 當使用者選取其中一個指令動詞，而對應的事件處理常式叫用。When a user selects one of the verbs, the event handler of the corresponding is invoked. > [!NOTE] > 設計階段環境通常提供**屬性...**元件上按一下滑鼠右鍵功能表上的項目。A design-time environment typically provides a **Properties...** entry on a component's right-click menu. 若要避免重複的標題的功能表項目，應該包含沒有動詞命令，與 [屬性] 的標題，在。To avoid duplicate titles for menu entries, no verb with a title of "Properties..." should be included in a .
